headline: PPL vs. FirstEnergy: Which Utility Stock Powers Up Stronger Returns?
summary: Both PPL and FE are regulated electric utilities and investing in infrastructure improvements to cater the rising demand from data centers.

raw.headline: PPL vs. FirstEnergy: Which Utility Stock Powers Up Stronger Returns?
raw.summary: Both PPL and FE are regulated electric utilities and investing in infrastructure improvements to cater the rising demand from data centers.

headline: PPL to Pay Quarterly Stock Dividend Oct. 1, 2025
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) declared a quarterly common stock dividend on Friday, Aug. 22, 2025, of $0.2725 per share, payable Oct. 1, 2025 to shareowners of record as of Sept.10, 2025.
